prompt: Arrange my vacation photos into a colorful grid collage, balancing the sizes and orientation of each shot for a modern, visually striking Instagram-ready layout.
Transform a candid selfie into a hyper-realistic 3D action figure, including detailed clothing textures, glossy toy packaging background, and a dynamic pose ready for display.
Change my pet’s portrait into a vibrant kawaii-style sticker, featuring oversized sparkling eyes, bold cartoon outlines, pastel backgrounds, and playful accessory add-ons like hats and bows.
Remix a group of individual friend portraits into a seamless, natural-looking team photo, matching lighting and perspective, and placing everyone in a fun party backdrop with confetti.
Take a regular landscape snapshot and turn it into a cinematic scene at golden hour, with enhanced sunset lighting, exaggerated lens flares, and warm, glowing highlights on every subject.
Merge two separate photos—one of myself and another of a famous painting—so I appear to be standing perfectly inside the artwork, matched in color, brushstroke texture, and lighting.
Reimagine a classic selfie as an iPhone commercial, applying soft face-smoothing, bright even lighting, subtle lens flare, and a minimalist blurred backdrop reminiscent of Apple promo shots.
Overlay AR-style product labels onto a photo of a bicycle, using floating neon-colored text callouts and semi-transparent frames to highlight the brakes, gears, and frame components.
Transform a candid family photo into a magazine-style cover image, with bold typography, polished skin edits, and a clean studio background for a professional, editorial effect.
Place me in a vibrant 1980s-inspired setting, giving me big retro hair, neon fashion, boom box props, and a background with pixel art arcade machines and flashing lights.
Blend a pet portrait with a painting style, turning my dog’s photo into an oil-on-canvas masterpiece with visible brushstrokes, rich color, and a subtle gallery wall backdrop.
Enhance a business headshot by giving it a futuristic cyberpunk city background, glowing neon edges, high-tech light reflections, and subtle digital glitch effects throughout.
Take a series of event photos and organize them into a stylish, asymmetrical grid with alternating sizes and geometric frames, emulating a high-end fashion collage.
Turn a casual backyard photo into a whimsical fairy tale scene, adding soft pastel colors, floating glimmers, toadstools, butterflies, and magical forest details to the background.
Transform a street-style selfie into a dramatic noir movie poster, bathing everything in stark black and white, adding rain reflections, smoky atmosphere, and high-contrast lighting.
Convert a selfie so it looks like an old vintage polaroid, with a washed-out matte finish, a wide white border, handwritten timestamp in the corner, and a soft indoor flash effect.
Take a food picture and explode ingredients outward from the plate, adding colorful fruit, spices, and swirling smoke in a high-energy, stop-motion-inspired burst for food blog use.
Assemble multiple candid selfies into a photo booth strip, arranging them vertically with high-contrast color frames, playful props, and a classic retro booth background.
Edit a couples’ photo so that the two people are floating above a dreamy, cloud-filled landscape, with glowing heart-shaped lights and a surreal sky in the background.
Place a child in a comic book hero scene, giving them a digitally drawn superhero costume, glowing powers, and a city skyline backdrop with dramatic comic panel effects.
Change a simple product snapshot into a minimalist e-commerce showcase, adding a clean white background, soft drop shadow, subtle product highlights, and crisp floating text.
Transform a pet sitting on the couch into a humorous regal portrait—dress it up in royal attire, position it on a velvet throne, and add a grand palace background for effect.
Take a group of holiday party photos and combine them into a festive montage, layering snow, twinkling string lights, Santa hats, and colorful gift props for a celebratory vibe.
Edit an outdoor workout photo into a high-intensity sports commercial, with sharp motion blur, glowing energy streaks around the subject, and a dark urban background.
Remix a travel selfie so my silhouette is outlined against a multicolored sunset behind a famous landmark, with atmospheric haze and stylized birds flying past for a postcard look.
Generate an iPhone-style selfie portrait with natural skin tones, soft backlight, and subtle lens flare, optimized for mobile display.
Convert the subject into a chibi-style emoji sticker with oversized eyes, simplified features, bold outlines, and a pastel background.
Create an atmospheric cinematic urban night scene with neon reflections, deep shadows, and volumetric fog.
Render the image with a vintage Polaroid aesthetic: faded colors, matte finish, wide white border, and a handwritten timestamp.
Produce an abstract portrait with bold color grading, painterly textures, and surreal lighting.
Generate a vibrant festival scene depicting traditional attire, decorative lighting, and celebratory crowds.
Upscale and retouch to a 4K portrait suitable for social media avatars with natural skin tones and high detail.
Create a cinematic couple/family portrait emphasizing emotional connection and soft golden light.
Compose a multi-generation heritage portrait with warm documentary tones and natural poses.
Create a short-form content prompt template for a viral social-media photo challenge (TikTok/Instagram).
Generate a daily trending photo or meme prompt suitable for viral content creation.
Recreate this cat as a 16-bit video game character, and place the character in a level of a 2D 16-bit platform video game.
comment: Nano Banana example — viral pet remixes and retro game transformations are highly shareable.

prompt: Create a realistic small 3D model of this dog and place the model on a desk next to birthday packaging, making it look like an unwrapped collectible.
comment: Official Nano Banana demo — the 'miniature collectible' trend is driving lots of Nano Banana edits.

prompt: Create a photorealistic professional headshot from this selfie: studio lighting, neutral backdrop, retain facial features and natural skin tones, high-resolution.
comment: Many users rely on Gemini for quick headshots; covered in Mashable and how-to guides as a trending use-case.

prompt: Merge these two uploaded images seamlessly: insert the hand holding a coffee cup into the foreground of the landscape photo, match lighting and shadows for a photorealistic composite.
comment: Mentioned in Mashable and Google's docs — image merging/compositing is a popular Gemini workflow.

prompt: Transform this portrait into a retro Bollywood movie poster: 90s grainy film aesthetic, warm golden tones, dramatic shadows, subtle light leaks and vintage vignette.
comment: Quillbot/Bytesteel and Nano Banana examples highlight retro/festival aesthetics trending across social platforms.

prompt: Replace the sky in this photo with a dramatic starry night or fiery sunset and color-grade the scene to match the foreground naturally.
comment: Listed in NDTV's top Gemini prompts — sky replacements are an easy, high-impact edit many creators use.

prompt: Change the ambient light to 'evening' with a soft golden-hour glow and gentle shadows; increase vibrance without unnatural saturation.
comment: NavEdits and NDTV show ambient-light prompts as a simple way to alter mood and boost engagement.

prompt: Create a lifelike miniature figurine of this person posed on a desk with a round transparent acrylic base and original-style toy packaging art.
comment: Bytesteel copy-paste prompt — the Nano Banana figurine/toy aesthetic is one of the biggest viral trends.

prompt: Generate a 9-panel cinematic story with these two uploaded protagonists as secret superheroes; produce nine sequential images that tell an emotional arc without any text.
comment: Nano Banana example demonstrating Gemini's ability to create multi-image narratives — trending for creators making visual stories.

prompt: Remove distracting elements (e.g., fences, power lines), restore the background seamlessly, then apply a subtle shallow depth-of-field blur to emphasize the subject.
comment: Commonly recommended in tutorials (NavEdits/NDTV) — cleanup + portrait-style blur is a top practical editing prompt.

prompt: Design a collectible trading card from this uploaded photo: add character stats, custom outfit, foil texture, high-detail card layout and back art
comment: From Mashable — trading-card style edits are popular for collectibles and nostalgia

prompt: Enhance the background: add photorealistic rain and dolphins in the distance, matching lighting, shadows and reflections to the original photo
comment: Mashable example shows Gemini's strong background-addition/editing capabilities

prompt: Transform this pet photo into a realistic 1/6 scale 3D figurine on a desk with an acrylic base and branded packaging art
comment: Google Nano Banana example — 3D figurine transformations are a viral Nano Banana trend

prompt: Generate a professional headshot from this selfie: studio lighting, neutral backdrop, natural skin tones, preserve facial features while retouching blemishes
comment: NDTV lists headshot creation/editing as a high-demand Gemini use case

prompt: Merge these two uploads seamlessly: place the hand holding a coffee cup into the Grand Canyon foreground and match perspective, lighting and depth
comment: Inspired by Google blog examples demonstrating Gemini's multi-image compositing strength

prompt: Place the uploaded person into a favorite fantasy franchise scene (e.g., Game of Thrones) with authentic costume, props and cinematic atmosphere
comment: Mashable notes fandom-immersion edits are trending and widely shared

prompt: Convert this portrait into a 16-bit platformer character and place it in a detailed 2D level with parallax background and pixel-art lighting
comment: Nano Banana examples popularized retro game sprite transformations

prompt: Recreate this portrait as a retro Bollywood movie poster: grainy 90s film aesthetic, warm golden tones, dramatic shadows and vintage styling
comment: QuillBot/Bytesteelcloud highlighted the retro Bollywood/saree aesthetic as a viral prompt

prompt: Generate a 9-panel visual story of these two protagonists (no text): maintain character consistency, cinematic lighting, clear narrative beats across images
comment: Google's Nano Banana demo used multi-image storytelling — trend for episodic AI-generated visuals

prompt: Make targeted local edits: remove power lines from the skyline, replace sky with a starry night, sharpen stone textures while preserving the subject
comment: Echoes NDTV/Google prompting tips — precise local edits are practically useful and highly requested
